description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
age provided by author in data file
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
age group of the participant – adult(>11) / juvenil(6-10) / infant(1-5)
number of times the participant looked to the ceiling following the gaze of the experimenter
number of times the participant looked to the ceiling when the experimenter did not gaze to the ceiling
the difference in number of times the participant looked to the ceiling in gaze_ex and gaze_co (gaze_ex minus gaze_co)
number of times the participant looked to the ceiling again in experimental condition (when experimenter gazed to the ceiling)
number of times the participant looked to the ceiling again in control condition (when experimenter did not gaze to the ceiling)
